backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the SurgiPaw backend defining data types (SurgeryCase, Task, Species, Sex) and CRUD operations for surgery cases, user profiles, and OpenAI configuration with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing planned fixes for the Quick Fill text parser in parseStructuredText.ts, covering field boundary parsing for pet name/owner name, multi-word sex values, and date-of-birth recognition.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of all frontend source files describing the purpose and key functionality of each component, hook, utility, and feature module in the React frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, borders, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the SurgiPaw PWA, referencing favicons, a web manifest, Apple touch icons, and the main React module entry script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for SurgiPaw specifying app name, theme colors, display mode, and icon assets for 192x192 and 512x512 sizes.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first strategy that precaches the app shell on install, cleans old caches on activate, and caches static assets at runtime while skipping Internet Identity and API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, view routing between dashboard/cases/settings, profile setup modal, dark-mode prevention, and navigation handlers for case selection and new case creation.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Empty file with no content, likely a placeholder for an authentication context module.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Au: Empty file with no content, likely a placeholder for an authentication view component.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts a new user to enter their name and saves their profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines checklist items for surgery case tasks and provides utility functions to compute task counts, remaining items, default selections, and Tailwind color classes.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Displays a surgery case as a card with inline note editing, task checklist editing, and delete confirmation, using mutation hooks to persist changes.
Dialog form for creating or editing a surgery case, featuring MRN-based auto-prefill, AI text parsing, speech recognition input, and checklist task selection.
Main list view for surgery cases with search, species/task filtering, sorting, highlight-on-select scrolling, and controls to open the new case dialog.
Search input component with a clear button for filtering cases by any field.
Dropdown select control for choosing the sort order of the cases list.
A popover filter component for filtering surgery cases by species, with checkboxes for each species option and session storage persistence.
A popover filter component for filtering surgery cases by task types and completion status, with session storage persistence for filter state.
A checklist editor component that supports two modes—creation (toggling task selection) and completion (toggling task completion)—rendering colored checkbox items from CHECKLIST_ITEMS.
A panel component providing CSV export and import functionality for surgery cases, handling parsing errors, progress tracking, and create/update mutations for each imported case.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A date input component supporting manual MM/DD/YYYY entry with auto-slash insertion and a calendar popover picker, with auto-advance on complete input.
Provides exportCasesToCsv and importCasesFromCsv functions to serialize surgery cases to CSV and parse CSV files back into case data with validation error reporting.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the CSV schema for veterinary surgery case import/export, including column headers, TypeScript types, and validation constants for species, sex, boolean, and date formats.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Provides filter functions for surgery cases by species, selected incomplete task types, all-tasks-completed status, and exclusion of fully completed cases.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: A React hook that wraps the browser's SpeechRecognition API to provide recording state, transcript accumulation, error handling, and start/stop controls.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors, and removing artifacts; used as a fallback text cleaner.
Parses label:value formatted text lines into a partial CaseFormData object, mapping recognized field labels to typed values including species, sex, dates, and string fields.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates and triggers a browser print dialog for a landscape HTML table report of surgery cases with remaining checklist tasks, using a hidden iframe.
Generates and downloads a timestamped CSV report of surgery cases including remaining tasks, using browser Blob and anchor-click download without external dependencies.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides utility functions to format case data (dates, species, sex, task lists, and text truncation) for PDF display.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides utility functions to format case data (dates, species, sex) for CSV/report display, nearly identical to pdfFormatters but scoped to CSV output.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters a list of SurgeryCase objects by a search query, matching against basic fields and remaining (selected but incomplete) checklist task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file, likely a placeholder for an AI image analysis service.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options and a sortCases function to sort SurgeryCase arrays by arrival date or number of open tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines constants for species and sex dropdown options and the CaseFormData interface used in case creation/editing forms.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields and utility functions for converting between Date objects and nanosecond bigints, plus date string parsing in multiple formats.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard UI component that displays, searches, filters, and sorts surgery cases, with support for task filtering, PDF export, and navigation to individual cases.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions to extract open task items from a single case and calculate the total open task count across all cases.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Settings page component that allows users to configure and save an OpenAI API key, displaying the current validation status of the key.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using the user's Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic React hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay, returning the debounced value.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on surgery cases and related data (user profiles, tasks, OpenAI config) by calling backend actor methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines a light-blue-themed design token system using OKLCH CSS custom properties for colors, with dark mode overridden to always use light theme.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind CSS class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf-autotable module.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf module.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript ambient module declaration for tesseract.js, defining interfaces for OCR workers, recognition results, and enums for page segmentation and OCR engine modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends the theme with Inter font and custom border radii, and registers the animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the veterinary case management app's project state, including known issues with the Quick Fill from Text parser (field boundary misidentification, multi-word sex values, missing DOB parsing) and four corresponding fix feature definitions.
